conversations.content: Bob sent me an email about today's meeting, please check it and complete the tasks he request me to do.

<|Function_Thought|>
I will first determine today's date so I can identify which email refers to "today's meeting." Then I will retrieve unread emails to find Bob's message about the meeting.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_current_day()]<|/Function_Call|>

<|Function_Thought|>
I received the current date: 2024-05-19, so "today's meeting" refers to that day. Next, I will fetch unread emails to locate Bob's message about the meeting and determine the tasks he requested.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[]<|/Function_Call|>
